comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content: This photo shows Hauptmann Weyert (on the left) and Hauptmann Franz Walz (right), a Bavarian who had served previously as the leader of Jasta Boelcke. He came to Palestine after some intrigue/upheaval at Jasta Boelcke where his low victory score was claimed as a sign of poor leadership by some pilots under his command. (Ltn. Werner Voss, among them). All parties involved were transferred out, Walz coming to Palestine as leader of Flieger-Abteilung 304b. He served there as an effective leader and was awarded the Pour le Merite. The aircraft in the background is an LVG C.V.
